00035 /** 
00036  * Process another cel files worth of data.
00037  */
00038 double HomHiLoCelListener::computeStatistic(std::vector<double>& vData, double dEmThreshold, double dBinSize) {
00039 
00040         dBinSize = dBinSize / 2.0;
00041   // Find the 3 peaks in contrast values (AA, AB, BB)
00042   double peak1, peak2, peak3;
00043   computeClusterPeaks(vData,peak1,peak2,peak3,dEmThreshold, 0.10);
00044   
00045   Verbose::out(4,"HomHiLo - Peaks: " + ToStr(peak1) + ", " + ToStr(peak2) + ", " + ToStr(peak3));
00046 
00047   // Find the valleys
00048   double valley1 = computeClusterValleyFixedEndPoint(vData,peak1,peak2,dBinSize);
00049   double valley2 = computeClusterValleyFixedEndPoint(vData,peak2,peak3,dBinSize);
00050   
00051   Verbose::out(4,"HomHiLo -  Valleys: " + ToStr(valley1) + ", " + ToStr(valley2));
00052 
00053   // How many contrast values under each peak
00054   double densityPeak1 = getContrastDensity(vData,peak1,dBinSize);
00055   double densityPeak3 = getContrastDensity(vData,peak3,dBinSize);
00056   
00057   Verbose::out(4,"HomHiLo -  densityPeaks: " + ToStr(densityPeak1) + ", " + ToStr(densityPeak3));
00058 
00059   // How many contrast values under each valley
00060   double densityValley1 = getContrastDensity(vData,valley1,dBinSize);
00061   double densityValley2 = getContrastDensity(vData,valley2,dBinSize);
00062   
00063   Verbose::out(4,"HomHiLo - densityValleys: " + ToStr(densityValley1) + ", " + ToStr(densityValley2));
00064 
00065   // Compute Hom Hi Low
00066   double minHomHiLo = 0.1;
00067   double mn1 = densityPeak1 - densityValley1;
00068   double mn2 = densityPeak3 - densityValley2;
00069 
00070   // Get Min
00071   if (mn1 < mn2)
00072    minHomHiLo = mn1;
00073   else
00074    minHomHiLo = mn2;
00075 
00076   return minHomHiLo;
00077 }

00079 /** 
00080  * Process another cel files worth of data.
00081  */
00082 void HomHiLoCelListener::newChip(FusionCELData *cel) {
00083   std::vector<ChipSummary::Metric> metrics;
00084   m_SummaryStats.push_back(metrics);
00085   m_CelNames.push_back(cel->GetFileName());
00086 
00087   // Get Contrast Values
00088   vector<double> contrastValues;
00089   fillInContrastValues(cel, m_ProbeSets, contrastValues, m_K);
00090 
00091   // Find the 3 peaks in contrast values (AA, AB, BB)
00092   double peak1, peak2, peak3;
00093   computeClusterPeaks(contrastValues,peak1,peak2,peak3,m_EmThresh);
00094   Verbose::out(4,"HomHiLo - " + Fs::basename(cel->GetFileName()) + " -  " + m_Label + 
00095           " - Peaks: " + ToStr(peak1) + ", " + ToStr(peak2) + ", " + ToStr(peak3));
00096 
00097   // Find the valleys
00098   double valley1 = computeClusterValley(contrastValues,peak1,peak2,m_BinSize);
00099   double valley2 = computeClusterValley(contrastValues,peak2,peak3,m_BinSize);
00100   Verbose::out(4,"HomHiLo - " + Fs::basename(cel->GetFileName()) + " -  " + m_Label + 
00101           " - Valleys: " + ToStr(valley1) + ", " + ToStr(valley2));
00102 
00103   // How many contrast values under each peak
00104   double densityPeak1 = getContrastDensity(contrastValues,peak1,m_BinSize);
00105   double densityPeak3 = getContrastDensity(contrastValues,peak3,m_BinSize);
00106   Verbose::out(4,"HomHiLo - " + Fs::basename(cel->GetFileName()) + " -  " + m_Label + 
00107           " - Peak Density: " + ToStr(densityPeak1) + ", " + ToStr(densityPeak3));
00108 
00109   // How many contrast values under each valley
00110   double densityValley1 = getContrastDensity(contrastValues,valley1,m_BinSize);
00111   double densityValley2 = getContrastDensity(contrastValues,valley2,m_BinSize);
00112   Verbose::out(4,"HomHiLo - " + Fs::basename(cel->GetFileName()) + " -  " + m_Label + 
00113           " - Valley Density: " + ToStr(densityValley1) + ", " + ToStr(densityValley2));
00114 
00115   // Compute Hom Hi Low
00116   double minHomHiLo = 0.1;
00117   double mn1 = densityPeak1 - densityValley1;
00118   double mn2 = densityPeak3 - densityValley2;
00119 
00120   // Get Min
00121   if (mn1 < mn2)
00122    minHomHiLo = mn1;
00123   else
00124    minHomHiLo = mn2;
00125 
00126   Verbose::out(4,"HomHiLo - " + Fs::basename(cel->GetFileName()) + " -  " + m_Label + 
00127           " - mn1,mn2,min: " + ToStr(mn1) + ", " + ToStr(mn2) + ", " + ToStr(minHomHiLo));
00128 
00129   // Populate the Summary Metrics
00130   m_SummaryStats[m_CelNames.size()-1].push_back(ChipSummary::Metric(m_Label, minHomHiLo));
00131 
00132   ///@todo option to report other metrics?
00133 
00134   setValid(true);
00135 }

00137 /** 
00138  * Loop through the probesets provided and calculate a contrast value
00139  * for each one using the median of PM probes for A allele and B
00140  * allele.
00141  */
00142 ///@todo refactor? simmilar code in EmGenderCelListener
00143 void HomHiLoCelListener::fillInContrastValues(FusionCELData *cel,
00144                                               std::vector<ProbeListPacked> &probeSets, 
00145                                               std::vector<double> &contrastValues,
00146                                               double k)
00147 {
00148   contrastValues.clear();
00149   contrastValues.reserve(probeSets.size());
00150   for(int psIx = 0; psIx < probeSets.size(); psIx++) {
00151     const ProbeSet *ps =  ProbeListFactory::asProbeSet(probeSets[psIx]);
00152     contrastValues.push_back(CalculateEMContrast(cel, ps, k));
00153     delete ps;
00154   }
00155 }
00156 
00157 /**
00158  * Calculate contrast values
00159  */
00160 ///@todo refactor? simmilar code in EmGenderCelListener
00161 double HomHiLoCelListener::CalculateEMContrast(FusionCELData* cel, const ProbeSet* ps, const double k) {
00162     float Amedian = -1, Bmedian = -1;
00163     bool medianOk = alleleMedians(cel, ps, Amedian, Bmedian);
00164     if(!medianOk || Amedian <= 0 || Bmedian <= 0) {
00165       Err::errAbort("HomHiLoCelListener::fillInContrastValues() - Warning. alleleMedian() failed for probeset: " + 
00166               ToStr(ps->name));
00167     }
00168     double contrast = -2, strength = -2;
00169     ContrastExtremesStretch(k, Amedian, Bmedian, contrast, strength);
00170 
00171     if(fabs(contrast) > 1) {
00172       Err::errAbort("HomHiLoCelListener::fillInContrastValues() - Can't have abs(contrast) > 1 for probeset: " + 
00173               ToStr(ps->name));
00174     }
00175     return contrast;
00176 }

00178 /**
00179  * Compute the cluster peaks using EM
00180  */
00181 void HomHiLoCelListener::computeClusterPeaks(vector<double> &contrastValues, double &peak1, double &peak2, double &peak3, double emThresh, double dMinMu) {
00182     CEMSeed seed;
00183     seed.setMu(-0.66f, 0.0f, 0.66f);
00184     seed.setSigma(0.1f, 0.1f, 0.1f);
00185     seed.setWeight(0.33f, 0.34f, 0.33f);
00186     seed.setMinMu(-2.0f, -.05f, dMinMu);
00187     seed.setMinSigma(0.02f, 0.02f, 0.02f);
00188     seed.setMaxMu(-dMinMu, .05f, 2.0f);
00189     seed.setMaxSigma(.3f, .3f, .3f);
00190 
00191     CPrimeEM em;
00192     em.setData(contrastValues);
00193     em.setThreshold(emThresh);
00194     em.EMEstimate(seed);
00195     CEMEst* pEst = em.getEMEstimates();
00196 
00197     peak1 = pEst->m_mu[0];
00198     peak2 = pEst->m_mu[1];
00199     peak3 = pEst->m_mu[2];
00200 }
00201 
00202 /**
00203  * Compute the Valley Between Two Points (The corrected version.)
00204  */ 
00205 double HomHiLoCelListener::computeClusterValleyFixedEndPoint(const std::vector<double>& contrast, double x1, double x2, double bin){
00206     double valleyX = x1;
00207     double valleyDensity = getContrastDensity(contrast, valleyX, bin);
00208     double x = x1;
00209     while (x < x2) {
00210         x += 2.0 * bin;
00211                 if (x > x2) {x = x2;}
00212         double density = getContrastDensity(contrast, x, bin);
00213         if (density < valleyDensity){
00214             valleyX = x;
00215             valleyDensity = density;
00216         }
00217     }
00218     return valleyX;
00219 }
00220 
00221 /**
00222  * Compute the Valley Between Two Points
00223  */ 
00224 double HomHiLoCelListener::computeClusterValley(const std::vector<double>& contrast, double x1, double x2, double bin){
00225     double valleyX = x1;
00226     double valleyDensity = getContrastDensity(contrast, valleyX, bin);
00227     double x = x1 + 2.0 * bin;
00228     while (x < x2) {
00229         double density = getContrastDensity(contrast, x, bin);
00230         if (density < valleyDensity){
00231             valleyX = x;
00232             valleyDensity = density;
00233         }
00234         x += 2.0 * bin;
00235     }
00236     return valleyX;
00237 }
00238 
00239 /**
00240  * Compute the density of values for a given bin
00241  */
00242 double HomHiLoCelListener::getContrastDensity(const std::vector<double>& contrast, double x, double bin){
00243     double lb = x - bin;
00244     double ub = x + bin;
00245     size_t n = contrast.size();
00246     int count = 0;
00247     for (size_t i=0; i < n; i++) {
00248         if ( (contrast[i]> lb) && (contrast[i] <= ub))
00249             count++;
00250     }
00251     return 100.0*(double(count)/double(n));
00252 }

00256 // Remember this will remain in effect until the end of the file.
00257 #undef min

00260 void HomHiLoCelListener::computeMixtureModel(
00261                                   const vector<double>& xdata,
00262                                   double& sigma,
00263                                   double& delta,
00264                                   double& P,
00265                                   double& K,
00266                                   bool symmetrize,
00267                                   double sigmaInit,
00268                                   double deltaInit,
00269                                   double PInit,
00270                                   double KInit)
00271 {
00272     const int maxIter = 200;
00273     const double epsilon = 5.0e-7;
00274     const double nearZero = std::numeric_limits<double>::min();
00275 
00276     vector<double> z1(xdata.size());
00277     vector<double> z2(xdata.size());
00278     vector<double> z3(xdata.size());
00279 
00280     int dataSize = xdata.size();
00281     if (symmetrize) {
00282         dataSize *= 2;
00283     }
00284 
00285     sigma = sigmaInit;
00286     delta = deltaInit;
00287     P = PInit;
00288     K = KInit;
00289     double logL = logLikelihood(xdata, sigma, delta, P, K);
00290 
00291     double logLprev;
00292     int iCount = 0;
00293 
00294     do {
00295         for (int i = 0; i < xdata.size(); i++) {
00296             double dd = mixSum(xdata[i], sigma, delta, P, K);
00297             if (dd < nearZero) {
00298                 z2[i] = 0.0;
00299                 if (xdata[i] > 0.0) {
00300                     z1[i] = 1.0;
00301                     z3[i] = 0.0;
00302                 } else {
00303                     z1[i] = 0.0;
00304                     z3[i] = 1.0;
00305                 }
00306             } else {
00307                 z1[i] = P/2.0 * dnorm(xdata[i], sigma, delta)/dd;
00308                 z2[i] = (1.0 - P) * dnorm(xdata[i], K*sigma, 0.0)/dd;
00309                 z3[i] = P/2.0 * dnorm(xdata[i], sigma, -delta)/dd;
00310             }
00311         }
00312         double A1 = 0.0;
00313         double A2 = 0.0;
00314         double A3 = 0.0;
00315         double M1 = 0.0;
00316         double M3 = 0.0;
00317         for (int i = 0; i < xdata.size(); i++) {
00318             A1 += z1[i];
00319             A2 += z2[i];
00320             A3 += z3[i];
00321             M1 += z1[i]*xdata[i];
00322             M3 += z3[i]*xdata[i];
00323         }
00324         if (symmetrize) {
00325             // The following amounts to doing the loop above with xdata[i] replaced by -xdata[i].
00326             A1 = A1 + A3;
00327             A2 += A2;
00328             A3 = A1;
00329             M1 = M1 - M3;
00330             M3 = -M1;
00331         }
00332 
00333         delta = (M1 - M3)/(A1 + A3);
00334 
00335         double M11 = 0.0;
00336         double M21 = 0.0;
00337         double M31 = 0.0;
00338         for (int i = 0; i < xdata.size(); i++) {
00339             M11 += z1[i]*(xdata[i] - delta)*(xdata[i] - delta);
00340             M21 += z2[i]*xdata[i]*xdata[i];
00341             M31 += z3[i]*(xdata[i] + delta)*(xdata[i] + delta);
00342         }
00343         if (symmetrize) {
00344             // The following amounts to doing the loop above with xdata[i] replaced by -xdata[i].
00345             M11 = M11 + M31;
00346             M21 += M21;
00347             M31 = M11;
00348         }
00349 
00350         // maxima (critical points)
00351         P = (A1 + A3)/dataSize;
00352         sigma = sqrt((M11 + M21/(K*K) + M31)/dataSize);
00353         K = sqrt(M21/A2)/sigma;
00354 
00355         if (K > 1.0) {
00356             K = 1.0;
00357         }
00358         logLprev = logL;
00359         logL = logLikelihood(xdata, sigma, delta, P, K);
00360 
00361         iCount++;
00362     } while (iCount < maxIter && logL - logLprev > epsilon);
00363 }
00364 
00365 float HomHiLoCelListener::computeSNPQC(const vector<double>& xdata, bool symmetrize)
00366 {
00367     double sigma;
00368     double delta;
00369     double P;
00370     double K;
00371     if (xdata.empty()) {
00372         return numeric_limits<float>::quiet_NaN();
00373     }
00374     computeMixtureModel(xdata, sigma, delta, P, K, symmetrize);
00375 
00376     return (delta*delta)/(sigma*sigma*(K*K + 1));
00377 }
00378 
00379 double HomHiLoCelListener::logLikelihood(
00380                               const std::vector<double>& xdata,
00381                               double sigma,
00382                               double delta,
00383                               double P,
00384                               double K)
00385 {
00386     double result = 0.0;
00387     for (int i = 0; i < xdata.size(); i++) {
00388         result += log(mixSum(xdata[i], sigma, delta, P, K));
00389     }
00390     // This works for both symmetrized and unsymmetrized case
00391     // since it's either result/size or (2*result)/(2*size).
00392     result /= xdata.size();
00393 
00394     return result;
00395 }
00396 
00397 double HomHiLoCelListener::mixSum(
00398                               double x,
00399                               double sigma,
00400                               double delta,
00401                               double P,
00402                               double K)
00403 {
00404     double result = P/2.0 * dnorm(x, sigma, delta) +
00405                     (1.0 - P) * dnorm(x, K*sigma, 0.0) +
00406                     P/2.0 * dnorm(x, sigma, -delta);
00407     return result;
00408 }
00409 
00410 double HomHiLoCelListener::dnorm(
00411                               double x,
00412                               double sigma,
00413                               double delta)
00414 {
00415     const double pi = 3.14159265358979323846;
00416     double result = exp(-0.5*(((x - delta)/sigma)*((x - delta)/sigma)));
00417     result /= sqrt(2.0 * pi);
00418     result /= sigma;
00419 
00420     return result;
00421 }
